engulf.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if an unpleasant feeling engulfs you, you feel it very strongly
engulf.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: despair so great it threatened to engulf him
engulf.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to completely surround or cover something
engulf.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The building was engulfed in flames.
